1: <pb/>Aye' tk'wal Dab'i ja'lu e'itz'ji toj Eb'ron: a Amnon tnejel k'wal, tal Aynoam, ju' aj Jesreel; tkab', a Danyel, tal Ab'ikayl, aj Karmel;
2: toxi'n Ab'salon, tal Maaka, ju' tmyal Talmay, nimaqkawil toj Kyesur; tkyaji'n Adoniy, tal Awit;
3: tjwe'yi'n, Sepatiy, tal Ab'ital; twaqaqi'n Itream, tal Ewla, ju' juntl t-xu'jil Dab'i.
4: Aye'tzun waqaq tk'wal Dab'iju' e'itz'ji toj Eb'ron, ja kawina' wuq ab'q'i tk'i' qaq xjaw. Atzun junaq oxlajoj (33) ab'q'i kawin toj Jerusalen,
5: jae'itz'ja' kyaje'tl tk'wal, aye': Sima, Sob'ab', Natan ex Salomon, tal B'et-sab'e, ju' tmyal Amyel.
6: Ex e'ten b'eljojtl tk'wal, aye': Ib'ar, Elisama. Elipelet,
9: Kykyaqil ja'lu tk'wal Dab'i qe', ex kyanab'ju' Tamar. Mya qe'tl kyeju' tk'wal kyuky'i'l txqantl tqya.
10: <pb/>Aye' tyajajil Salomon ja'lu: Rob'oam. Ab'iy, Asa, Josapat, Joram, Okosiy, Joas, Amasiy, Asariy, Jotam, Ajas, Esekyiy, Manases, Amon ex Josiy.
15: <pb/>Aye' tk'wal Josiy ja'lu: tnejel, Joanan; tkab', Joakyim; toxi'n, Sedekyiy; tkyaji'n, Salum.
16: <pb/>Aye' tk'wal Joakyim ju' Jekoniy ex Sedekyiy.
17: <pb/>Aye' tyajajil Jekoniy ja'lu, ju' ex iq'i'n toju' tx'otx', aye': Salatyel, ju' tnejel tk'wal,
18: exqe' Malkyiram, Pedayiy, Senasar, Jekamiy, Osama ex Nedab'iy.
19: <pb/>Aye' tk'wal Pedayiyju' Sorob'ab'el ex Simi. Aye'tzu'n tk'wal Sorob'ab'el aye': Mesulam ex Ananiy, ex Selomit ju' kyanab',
20: ex ten jwe'tl tk'wal, aye': Asub'a, Oel, B'erekyiy, Asadiy ex Jusab'-esed.
21: <pb/>Aye' tk'wal Ananiyju' Pelatiy ex Isayiy. Aye' tyajajil Isayiy ja'lu: Repayiy, Arnan, Ab'diy ex Sekaniy.
22: Aye' tk'wal Sekaniyju' Semayiy, Atus, Iwal, B'ariy, Neariy ex Sapat: Waqaq kyb'aj tu'n kykyaqil.
23: <pb/>Oxe' tk'wal Neariy ten, aye': Elyoenay, Esekyiy ex Asrikam.
24: <pb/>Wuq tk'wal Elyoenay e'ten, aye': Odab'iy, Elyasib', Pelayiy, Akub', Joanan, Delayiy ex Anani.
